introduction.title: Go F&B help you:
introduction.content: Receive and Send messages to customers coming from up to 5 Facebook fanpage and manage them in a single interface.
introduction.collectCustomersData: Collect customers data from Facebook automatically and create new contacts or link with existing contacts in your F&B store
introduction.createOrders: Create orders and send orders confirmation to chat conversations instantly
introduction.createTags: Create Tags and apply them to Facebook chat conversations
